title: Essential Captain America Vol. 1 (Trade Paperback)
description:
Eager to serve his country during World War Two, Steve Rogers was transformed into a physically perfect man by the government’s Super Soldier Program! Armed with an indestructible shield and the physical prowess of an Olympic athlete, Rogers fought valiantly to uphold the ideals and principles of democracy. At the end of the war, he was accidentally frozen in a block of ice and preserved for decades until discovered and revived by the Avengers. Now a man out of time, he is ever vigilant in his battle to protect the innocent and uphold the beliefs upon which America was founded. Willing to sacrifice his own life for the greater good, Steve Rogers is the physical embodiment of truth, justice and honor. He is… Captain America! Collecting TALES OF SUSPENSE #59-99 and CAPTAIN AMERICA #100-102.
All Ages …$19.99 
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3006-2
